task.title: Discontinuing managed preferences
task.shortdesc: To stop setting preferences through the Expeditor managed settings framework, remove the reference to the managed-settings.xml or managed-community-configs.xml file(s) and unlock any previously read-only settings.

step.cmd: Managed settings that were previously pushed to the clients as read-only will continue to be used until they are specifically removed from the client. Unlock all managed settings by editing the XML file:

substep.cmd: If the lastModDate atribute was used previously, change the lastModDate attribute to a newer timestamp for all group settings. Otherwise, skip this step.
Provision the updated XML file to the client.

step.cmd: Discontinue use of the settings.xml file based on the method you used to distribute managed preferences.

li.p:
The managed-settings.xml or managed-community-configs.xml file hosted on a web server
Remove the managed-settings.xml or managed-community-configs.xml file from the web server.
Modify the policies.user.xml and remove the URL that was previously hosting the managed-settings.xml or managed-community-configs.xml.
The managed-settings.xml file defined in a plugin_customization.ini file.

ul.li: Remove the com.ibm.rcp.managedsettings.provider.file/URL setting from the plugin_customization.ini file and provision the updated file to clients.
